   Chris Kennedy
   stated on February 9, 2018 in an interview with the Southern Illinoisan
   editorial board:
   "Zero percent of kids in Cairo are college-ready."

‘‘Zero percent of kids in Cairo are college-ready," Kennedy told the
   newspaper.

"It is the
   fault of Springfield that only 6 percent of Cairo Junior/Senior High
   School students (have) met college readiness levels," Kennedy said.

Our ruling

   Kennedy tried to make a point about inadequate state school funding when
   he declared "zero percent of kids in Cairo are college-ready."
